ProductInfo.Features:
With the assistance of the Media-Tek 1.3Ghz Dual Core processor and 512MB RAM, the Touchtalk Lite can easily handle the daily life of a modern day smartphone and offers a fast and fluid user experience.
The Touchtalk Lite comes with a 4" touchscreen, a brilliant size for web browsing, App browsing and general uses of the phone.
With Dual-SIM technology, the Touchtalk is able to have two SIM's inserted concurrently, giving you the flexibility of having alternative personal and business SIM's and numbers on the same phone.
Internet connectivity has never been easier. With WiFi and 3G connectivity, connect to the Internet where ever required.
Equipped with the latest Android software, Android 4.2, the Touchtalk has available the latest features from Google as well as having access to the Google Play Store
ProductInfo.Name: DJC Touchtalk Lite Smart Phone - Google Android 4.2 - Dual Core Processor 1.3GHz - 4" Touchscreen Display - Dual SIM - 3G/WIFI/Bluetooth Connectivity - GPS Blue
